name: nimedev-js-style
description: Airbnb JavaScript style guide adapted to nimedev style.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:base && npm run lint:react
scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config:base && npm run install:config:react
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-nimedev-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:react: cd packages/eslint-config-nimedev-react && npm prune && npm install
